message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer Alice! I'm interested, but I can only go up to $85 for the product right now.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $95.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  $90 is the absolute highest I can go at this point.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $98. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I can offer it to you for $98.
